verses.verse: Set the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> thy <S%H2441>mouth.<s%> He shall come as an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> they have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H6586>trespassed<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> my <S%H8451>law.<s%>
Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall <S%H2199>cry<s%> unto me, My <S%H430>God,<s%> we <S%H3045>know<s%> thee.
Israel <S%H3478><s%> hath cast <S%H2186>off<s%> the thing that is <S%H2896>good:<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%> shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> him.

They <S%H1992><s%> have set up <S%H4427>kings,<s%> but <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4480>by<s%> me: they have made <S%H8323>princes,<s%> and I <S%H3045>knew<s%> it <S%H3808>not:<s%> of their <S%H3701>silver<s%> and their <S%H2091>gold<s%> have they <S%H6213>made<s%> them <S%H6091>idols,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> they may be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>

Thy <S%H5695>calf,<s%> O <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> hath cast thee <S%H2186>off;<s%> mine <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against them: how <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> will it be <S%H3808>ere<s%> they <S%H3201>attain<s%> to <S%H5356>innocency?<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> from <S%H4480>Israel<s%> <S%H3478><s%> was <S%H1931>it<s%> also: the <S%H2796>workman<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1931>it;<s%> therefore it is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> the <S%H5695>calf<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> broken in <S%H7616>pieces.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> they have <S%H2232>sown<s%> the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and they shall <S%H7114>reap<s%> the <S%H5492>whirlwind:<s%> it hath <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7054>stalk:<s%> the <S%H6780>bud<s%> shall <S%H6213>yield<s%> <S%H1097>no<s%> <S%H7058>meal:<s%> if so <S%H194>be<s%> it <S%H6213>yield,<s%> the <S%H2114>strangers<s%> shall swallow it <S%H1104>up.<s%>

Israel <S%H3478><s%> is swallowed <S%H1104>up:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> shall they <S%H1961>be<s%> among the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> as a <S%H3627>vessel<s%> wherein is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2656>pleasure.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are gone <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> a wild <S%H6501>ass<s%> <S%H909>alone<s%> by himself: <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> hath <S%H8566>hired<s%> <S%H158>lovers.<s%>

Yea, <S%H1571><s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> they have <S%H8566>hired<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> them, and they shall <S%H2490>sorrow<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> for the <S%H4480>burden<s%> <S%H4853><s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8269>princes.<s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> hath made <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> to <S%H2398>sin,<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> unto him to <S%H2398>sin.<s%>
I have <S%H3789>written<s%> to him the great <S%H7230>things<s%> of my <S%H8451>law,<s%> but they were <S%H2803>counted<s%> <S%H3644>as<s%> a strange <S%H2114>thing.<s%>

They <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> for the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of mine <S%H1890>offerings,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> it; but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7521>accepteth<s%> them <S%H3808>not;<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> will he <S%H2142>remember<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H6485>visit<s%> their <S%H2403>sins:<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

For <S%H3478>Israel<s%> hath <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H6213>Maker,<s%> and <S%H1129>buildeth<s%> <S%H1964>temples;<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> hath <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H1219>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities:<s%> but I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> upon his <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> thereof.
